body: When one is as ritzy as I am, little in life can hold one's attention for long...
Want to impress me? You must be bold. You must be colourful!

option_text: Is this colourful enough for you?
body: Oh my! To think one such as you could happen across something so... So... Divine.
It must be mine! How much, you ask? My shell? Well... If you insist.
